unnormalised: Arey yaar, pesticide usage is a huge issue, no? Especially in places like Punjab. I remember my grandfather used to say things were different back in '60s. Now, everyone's spraying everything. Heard Dr. Sharma from IARI talking about organic options on 26/01/2023. Maybe we need to listen up? 08:00 pm news had something on this too! Gotta be better than loading everything with chemicals, right? Think of the poor soil and Ganga Maiya! Checked some articles, R.K. Gupta's report from 19/04/2024 also says something similar.
normalised: Arey yaar, pesticide usage is a huge issue, no? Especially in places like Punjab. I remember my grandfather used to say things were different back in sixties. Now, everyone's spraying everything. Heard Doctor Sharma from I A R I talking about organic options on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three. Maybe we need to listen up? eight p m news had something on this too! Gotta be better than loading everything with chemicals, right? Think of the poor soil and Ganga Maiya! Checked some articles, R K Gupta's report from nineteenth April two thousand and twenty four also says something similar.
